attributes.action: David Cameron MUST STOP Bangladesh Government killing Opposition Politicians
attributes.background:
Parliament must take immediate action to stop     
giving hundreds of millions of pounds in Foreign Aid to the Present 
Bangladesh Government and use its leverage to stop the Government killing Mr Motiur Rahman Nizami, an Opposition Politician and the former Industries Minister.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to raise this issue with the Bangladeshi Government.
